column1:
Prison population (per 100,000 people)
SDG 16.3 Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
Dimension: Human Security
Definition: Number of adult and juvenile prisoners–excluding non-criminal prisoners held for administrative purposes, unless otherwise noted, held in prisons, penal Institutions or correctional Institutions–expressed per 100,000 population.
Source: UNODC (United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime) (2019). UNODC Statistics and Data. https://dataunodc.un.org. Accessed 3 June 2019.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Data refer to the most recent year available during the period specified.
c: HDRO calculations based on data from UNODC (2019).
